details.top:
Abu Hurayrah (radhi-yAllaahu 'anhu) reported that the Messenger of Allaah (sal-Allaahu 'alayhe wa sallam) said:

 [There are] Two words, [which are] light on the tongue, heavy on the Scale and beloved to The Most Gracious:
details.arabic_diacless: سبحان اللٰه وبحمده، سبحان اللٰه العظيم
details.arabic: سُبْحَانَ اللّٰهِ وَبِحَمْدِهِ، سُبْحانَ اللّٰهِ الْعَظِيْمِ
details.translations: How perfect Allaah is and I praise Him. How perfect Allaah is, The Supreme.

pageTitle: Words Light on tongue, Heavy on the balance
